College CAP

Find Out More

Experience That Works For You!

We are experienced financial aid professionals that have many years of experience working at various post-secondary institutions. We understand the complexities of college financial aid models and how to help college bound students determine where they fit, in fact some cases we created those models.

It is our mission to guide families to make financially healthy decisions that will lead to a prosperous future, rather than digging out of student loan debt. While there are many choices out there, we believe that getting the help you need to make a wise financial decision shouldnâ€™t break the bank. Our services are geared to be personalized and low-cost.

Interested in finding out more about how we can help you? Reach out to us and find out through our free consultation.

At Your Service

Affordability Assessment

We work with clients to truly understand what they can afford to pay for college.

College List Assistance

Let us help you build a list of schools that you can afford without getting in cripling debt.

Application Assistance

Whether you have question about the FAFSA or the CSS Profile, we make it stress free.

Personalized Meetings

One on One meetings designed for you and your family's situation.

Our Guiding Principles

Personalized Service
We offer guidance that is based on your situation only. We take the time to understand your family dynamic and offer the best plan to maximize your investment.
Cost
Getting the right advice should not break the bank. We offer affordable services to get you the most for your money.
Ethical
We only provide ethical advice. If you are looking to cheat the system, sorry you came to the wrong place. If you are looking for honest, sound advice to maximize your return on investment, you came to the right place.
